response.overview: Mr. 9.6, who was distressed by his terrible illness, attempted to cure it by seeking help from traditional Chinese medicine, the Institute of Brain Science, and a nature spiritual training class, but it seemed to have had little effect. However, Mr. 9.6 met a girl in a nature spiritual training class who was the "suitor" of his beloved virtual idol. In a certain space, Mr. 9.6 met Miss K who looked exactly like the girl. In the conversation between Mr. 9.6 and Miss K, the truth of the disease was revealed: this is a desire problem that all people in the cyber era/network society have to face.
response.title: ES#3：Cyborg's Desire
